title: Convert YouTube Video to Blog Post
description: Transform YouTube video content into well-structured blog posts by extracting and processing the video transcript.
example_prompt:
Please help me convert this YouTube video into a blog post:

Video URL: [YouTube video URL]

Please:
1. Extract the video transcript
2. Create a well-structured blog post with:
   - Engaging title
   - Key points and main takeaways
   - Proper formatting and structure
   - Conclusion

Make sure the content flows naturally and maintains the original message of the video.
